mapper.insert:
insert into UO_OP_ACTIVITY_PLAN(HEAD_ID, USER_CNT, PLAN_DATE, PLAN_STATUS, ACTIVITY_STAGE,PLAN_DATE_WID,PLAN_TYPE,SUCCESS_NUM) values
(#{item.headId}, #{item.userCnt}, #{item.planDate}, #{item.planStatus}, #{item.stage}, #{item.planDateWid}, #{item.planType}, #{item.successNum})
mapper.select: select UO_OP_ACTIVITY_PLAN.PLAN_ID, UO_OP_ACTIVITY_PLAN.HEAD_ID, ACTIVITY_NAME, UO_OP_ACTIVITY_PLAN.ACTIVITY_STAGE, USER_CNT, PLAN_DATE_WID, PLAN_STATUS, PLAN_TYPE, SUCCESS_NUM, UO_OP_ACTIVITY_PLAN.COV_RATE, UO_OP_ACTIVITY_PLAN.COV_AMOUNT, UO_OP_ACTIVITY_PLAN.EFFECT_FLAG from UO_OP_ACTIVITY_PLAN left join UO_OP_ACTIVITY_HEADER on UO_OP_ACTIVITY_PLAN.HEAD_ID = UO_OP_ACTIVITY_HEADER.HEAD_ID where UO_OP_ACTIVITY_PLAN.HEAD_ID = #{headId}::int4 order by PLAN_DATE asc
select PLAN_ID, HEAD_ID, ACTIVITY_STAGE, USER_CNT, PLAN_DATE_WID, PLAN_DATE, PLAN_STATUS, PLAN_TYPE, SUCCESS_NUM, VERSION, EFFECT_FLAG from UO_OP_ACTIVITY_PLAN where plan_id = #{planId}::int4

select UO_OP_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.HEAD_ID, UO_OP_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.PLAN_ID, UO_OP_ACTIVITY_GROUP.GROUP_ID, UO_OP_ACTIVITY_GROUP.GROUP_NAME, COUNT(UO_OP_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.activity_detail_id) GROUP_USERNUM from UO_OP_ACTIVITY_DETAIL,UO_OP_ACTIVITY_GROUP,UO_OP_ACTIVITY_PLAN where UO_OP_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.HEAD_ID=UO_OP_ACTIVITY_GROUP.HEAD_ID AND UO_OP_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.GROUP_ID= UO_OP_ACTIVITY_GROUP.GROUP_ID AND UO_OP_ACTIVITY_PLAN.PLAN_TYPE=UO_OP_ACTIVITY_GROUP.ACTIVITY_TYPE AND UO_OP_ACTIVITY_PLAN.ACTIVITY_STAGE=UO_OP_ACTIVITY_GROUP.ACTIVITY_STAGE AND UO_OP_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.PLAN_ID = UO_OP_ACTIVITY_PLAN.PLAN_ID AND UO_OP_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.PLAN_ID = #{planId} GROUP BY UO_OP_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.HEAD_ID, UO_OP_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.PLAN_ID, UO_OP_ACTIVITY_GROUP.GROUP_ID, UO_OP_ACTIVITY_GROUP.GROUP_NAME ORDER BY UO_OP_ACTIVITY_GROUP.GROUP_ID ASC

SELECT count(*) FROM ( select UO_OP_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.SMS_CONTENT, COUNT(UO_OP_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.activity_detail_id) CNT from UO_OP_ACTIVITY_DETAIL,UO_OP_ACTIVITY_GROUP,UO_OP_ACTIVITY_PLAN where UO_OP_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.HEAD_ID=UO_OP_ACTIVITY_GROUP.HEAD_ID AND UO_OP_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.GROUP_ID= UO_OP_ACTIVITY_GROUP.GROUP_ID AND UO_OP_ACTIVITY_PLAN.PLAN_TYPE=UO_OP_ACTIVITY_GROUP.ACTIVITY_TYPE AND UO_OP_ACTIVITY_PLAN.ACTIVITY_STAGE=UO_OP_ACTIVITY_GROUP.ACTIVITY_STAGE AND UO_OP_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.PLAN_ID = UO_OP_ACTIVITY_PLAN.PLAN_ID AND UO_OP_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.PLAN_ID = #{planId} GROUP BY UO_OP_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.SMS_CONTENT ) v

SELECT SMS_CONTENT, CNT, LENGTH(SMS_CONTENT) SMSLENGTH FROM ( select UO_OP_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.SMS_CONTENT, COUNT(UO_OP_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.activity_detail_id) CNT from UO_OP_ACTIVITY_DETAIL,UO_OP_ACTIVITY_GROUP,UO_OP_ACTIVITY_PLAN where UO_OP_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.HEAD_ID=UO_OP_ACTIVITY_GROUP.HEAD_ID AND UO_OP_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.GROUP_ID= UO_OP_ACTIVITY_GROUP.GROUP_ID AND UO_OP_ACTIVITY_PLAN.PLAN_TYPE=UO_OP_ACTIVITY_GROUP.ACTIVITY_TYPE AND UO_OP_ACTIVITY_PLAN.ACTIVITY_STAGE=UO_OP_ACTIVITY_GROUP.ACTIVITY_STAGE AND UO_OP_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.PLAN_ID = UO_OP_ACTIVITY_PLAN.PLAN_ID AND UO_OP_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.PLAN_ID = #{planId} GROUP BY UO_OP_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.SMS_CONTENT ) v ORDER BY CNT DESC,SMS_CONTENT ASC limit #{limit} offset #{offset}

SELECT COUNT(ACTIVITY_DETAIL_ID) USER_COUNT, COUNT(CASE WHEN PUSH_STATUS='S' THEN PUSH_STATUS END) SUCCESS_COUNT, coalesce(SUM(CASE WHEN IS_CONVERSION=1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) COV_USERCOUNT, coalesce(SUM(coalesce(COV_AMOUNT,0)),0) COV_AMOUNT, coalesce(SUM(CASE WHEN IS_CONVERSION=1 AND coalesce(SPU_CONSISTENT,'N')='Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) SPU_USERCOUNT, coalesce(SUM(CASE WHEN IS_CONVERSION=1 AND coalesce(SPU_CONSISTENT,'N')='Y' THEN coalesce(COV_SPU_AMOUNT,0) ELSE 0 END),0) SPU_AMOUNT FROM( SELECT T2.ACTIVITY_DETAIL_ID, T2.PUSH_STATUS, T1.ACTIVITY_DETAIL_ID COVERT_DETAIL_ID, T1.IS_CONVERSION, T1.COV_AMOUNT, T1.SPU_CONSISTENT, T1.COV_SPU_AMOUNT FROM UO_OP_ACTIVITY_CONVERT_DETAIL T1 right join UO_OP_ACTIVITY_DETAIL T2 on T1.ACTIVITY_DETAIL_ID = T2.ACTIVITY_DETAIL_ID AND T2.PLAN_ID = #{planId}::int4) C

SELECT CONVERSION_DATE, SUM(COUNT(CASE WHEN PUSH_STATUS='S' THEN PUSH_STATUS END))OVER(PARTITION BY NULL) SUCCESS_COUNT, SUM(CASE WHEN IS_CONVERSION=1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) COV_USERCOUNT, SUM(CASE WHEN IS_CONVERSION=1 AND coalesce(SPU_CONSISTENT,'N')='Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) SPU_USERCOUNT FROM( SELECT T2.ACTIVITY_DETAIL_ID, T2.PUSH_STATUS, T1.ACTIVITY_DETAIL_ID COVERT_DETAIL_ID, T1.IS_CONVERSION, T1.COV_AMOUNT, T1.SPU_CONSISTENT, TO_CHAR(T1.CONVERSION_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') CONVERSION_DATE FROM UO_OP_ACTIVITY_CONVERT_DETAIL T1, UO_OP_ACTIVITY_DETAIL T2 WHERE T1.ACTIVITY_DETAIL_ID= T2.ACTIVITY_DETAIL_ID AND T2.PUSH_STATUS='S' AND T2.PLAN_ID = #{planId}::int4) as C GROUP BY CONVERSION_DATE

select t.user_id, --用户ID u.login_name user_name, --用户名 u.mobile, --手机号 t.path_active, --活跃度 t.user_value, --用户价值 t.push_period, --推送时段 t.conversion_period CONVERT_PERIOD, --转化时段 t.push_date, --推送日期 t.conversion_date convert_date, --转化日期 round((extract(day from t.conversion_date::timestamp-t.push_date::timestamp) * 24 + extract(hour from t.conversion_date::timestamp-t.push_date::timestamp))::numeric/24::numeric, 1)::varchar CONVERT_INTERVAL, --转换间隔 t.spu_consistent, --推荐SPU与购买SPU是否一致 Y表示是 N表示否 t.rec_spu_name PUSH_SPU, --推荐SPU名称 t.IS_CONVERSION IS_CONVERT, t.SPU_CONSISTENT SPU_IS_CONVERT --转化的SPU名称 from UO_OP_ACTIVITY_CONVERT_DETAIL t, w_users u,UO_OP_ACTIVITY_DETAIL t2 where t.user_id = u.id::varchar and t.IS_CONVERSION = 1 and t.activity_detail_id=t2.activity_detail_id and t2.plan_id=#{planId}::int4 ORDER BY t.activity_detail_id ASC limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
select count(1) from UO_OP_ACTIVITY_CONVERT_DETAIL t,UO_OP_ACTIVITY_DETAIL t2 where t.activity_detail_id=t2.activity_detail_id and t.IS_CONVERSION = '1' and t2.plan_id=#{planId}::int4
mapper.update: update uo_op_activity_plan t set plan_status='4' where plan_status='1' and now()>t.plan_date::timestamp
